modName: Amber Beauty - RaceMenu and BodySlide presets
summary: A new beautiful red head RaceMenu preset and a BodySlide preset to go with it!
descriptionHtml:
Hello people, I made more presets. Today we have what looks like Ms Fortune from League of Legends and a BodySlide preset made to look like Nezzar's body.

[color=#00ffff]---RACEMENU---[/color]
I wanted to make a red head girl with freckles and semi-tan skin. So that is what I did. The hair style I chose for this preset makes her slightly resemble Miss Fortune from League of Legends.

[color=#00ffff]---BODYSLIDE---[/color]
Ever seen "Nezzar's Lingerie Collection"? The body he made for that just looks so good, I wanted a BodySlide form of it to apply to other outfits. I sat down for 2 hours straight and made this, it is not the exact thing. I am not capable of making an exact replica since he made his own body (in blender or something) and honestly I wouldn't want to make an exact replica because that would be stealing his work. Instead I made something very similar that is close enough to make me happy.

[color=#00ffff]---INSTALL---[/color]
just throw it in the data folder. NMM or MO Installation is always easier.
[color=#00ff00]A note for the racemenu preset - the racemenu preset and sculpt will be named "redhead2" when you go to import it.[/color]

[color=#00ffff]---REQUIRES---[/color]
[b][color=#00ff00]﻿BS Preset[/color][/b]
[list=1]
[*]BodySlide and Outfit Studio (UUNP options from installer)
[*]xp32 maximum skeleton extended
[*]a UNP based skin texture
[/list] ﻿[b][color=#00ff00]RM Preset[/color][/b]
[list=1]
[*]RaceMenu
[*]KS Hairdos Renewal
[*]Fair Skin Complexion and all of the installer's optional addons (brows, eyes, etc.)
[*]The Eyes of Beauty
[*]The Eyes of Aber
[*]SG Female Brows
[*]Brows
[*]Freckle Mania 2
[/list]
[color=#00ffff]---PS---[/color]
[color=#f4f4f4]If anyone wants to suggest a cool idea for a RaceMenu preset and/or BodySlide preset, I'll look through comments and pick my favorites to make.[/color]
author: wnisewond
